an3.70:3.11: kiñcanatasmiṃ → kiñcanattasmiṃ (bj); kiñcanaṃ tasmiṃ (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed); kiñcanatasmi (?) | katthaci → kismiñci (sya-all); kassaci (pts-vp-pli1ed) | kiñcanatatthī’ti → kiñcana nātthīti (bj); kiñcanatthīti (sya-all); kiñcanaṃ natthīti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
an3.70:16.4: cātumahārājikā → cātummahārājikā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | tatuttari → tatuttariṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); taduttari (sya-all)
an3.70:17.2: gerukañca paṭicca, nāḷikasaṇḍāsañca → nāḷikañca paṭicca saṇḍāsañca (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
an3.70:28.2: pahūtarattaratanānaṃ → pahūtasattaratanānaṃ (bj, sya-all, km); pahūtamahāsattaratanānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | issariyādhipaccaṃ → issarādhipaccaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
an3.70:35.1: na haññe → na hāne (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); na hane (mr)
